column1: Baby Barnaby's////I ordered the natural squeeze oj
column2: which was of course delicious and ordered the GREEN EGGS. The platter comes with the sausage
column3: wheat toast and potatoes (scrumptious). I ordered mine with the veggie sausage
column4: which was pretty delicious. The green eggs are filled with artichokes
column5: spinach and cheese. They are actually very cheese
